Submodules¶

py_sca.acquire module¶

Acquire binary data side-channel data and parse it

This scripts allows to validate the side-channel data before correlating it

py_sca.clean module¶

Remove all the files created by this software

The goal of this script is to clean all the files created during correlation or acquisition.

py_sca.core module¶

API module to create a side-channel app

This module provides high-level features to ease the writing of an application based on our side channel library.

The functions of this module provide :

  • Application status logging

  • Time performance measurement

  • Plotting acquisition and correlation curves

Notes¶

  • In all the API, the filenames are following a precise nomenclature,

do not modify filenames without respecting it.

py_sca.correlate module¶

Correlate parsed acquisition data

This script allows to load CSV acquisition data and perform a side-channel which consists on retrieving the encryption key.

py_sca.setup module¶

Create necessary sub-directories and data for the framework

Module contents¶

Side-channel Python application

This project is a Python application that features side-channel acquisition from an SoC communicating via serial port. and side-channel attack via correlation of acquired data.
